page.title: 10POULTON SHOPPING CENTRE CONT
page.content:
There is also a high proportion of restaurants and cafes in Poulton centre. There is a limited number of clothes shops and shoe shops, with an absence of national chain stores, as many people go into nearby Blackpool for clothes and furniture.The facilities which Poulton offers are typical of those provided by a small market town. ################################# Pages 1-10 have been compiled by: LOWER SIXTH GEOGRAPHY SET, BAINES SCHOOL HIGHCROSS ROAD POULTON-LE-FYLDE LANCASHIRE FY6 8BD
JULY 1985
